title: Anlate Kawh Om
text:
ZBC - 216, Galhiam - 272

    • Mawhna lolai a ahoih teng buh lom A kaikhawm ding an late koi a om Nasep nadingin thumaan phiaukawi keng Kua mah khawl lo ding an lak khit mateng

 

  • An late kaw'h om Kua hong kuan nuam An lak pawi sungah Kua hong lungdam khawm nuam Kua'n hong koppih ding Buhlom hoih teng Mawhna losunga om buh lom teng

    • Zawineu zong zui in zong in pha takpi Lopa asau hang buh om thei ding hi lamlian zong zui inla nusiat nei ke'n Vantung innpi sung hong tum khin uh hen

    An late kaw'h om Kua hong kuan nuam An lak pawi sungah Kua hong lungdam khawm nuam Kua'n hong koppih ding Buhlom hoih teng Mawhna losunga om buh lom teng

    • Lo teng khempeuh ah an minkhin ta hi Leitung khempeuh in lak ding bek ngak hi A hih hang a la ding tawm lak ding tam La meng meng kei leenglah asia ding tam

    An late kaw'h om Kua hong kuan nuam An lak pawi sungah Kua hong lungdam khawm nuam Kua'n hong koppih ding Buhlom hoih teng Mawhna losunga om buh lom teng

    • Tua ahih ciang hong pai un phiaukawi tawh An pha kaikhawm un no mihing te aw An nei Topa hong pai mateng sem un Tua ciang an lak pawi ah lungdam khawm un
     

    An late kaw'h om Kua hong kuan nuam An lak pawi sungah Kua hong lungdam khawm nuam Kua'n hong koppih ding Buhlom hoih teng Mawhna losunga om buh lom teng

title: Amaute In La Thak A Sa Uh Hi
text:
ZBC 421, Galhiam 343

  • Vantung inn sungah i lawmte'n lasa hi Hong gum Topa a min a phatna uh hi Leitungah lungkhamna teng mangngilh khin a Mi siangthote'n lungdamna la thak a sa

Zeisu min phatni Kalani mualtung si zo hi Zeisu min phat hi Sihna zo a hing kik ta hi

  • Hong hehpihna phat na'ng la thak om kim hi A um ta ding thuphabel a hi ding hi Topa si a a piang kik a minthanna Ka gennasa nuambel hi Pasian kiangah

Zeisu min phatni Kalani mualtung si zo hi Zeisu min phat hi Sihna zo a hing kik ta hi

  • Tuni sipha tawh a kisil lote in tua la thak kuamah in sa thei lo ding hi Mawhnei te mawhna phel a hong hehpihna Phatna lungdamin limtakin la sa ni

Zeisu min phatni Kalani mualtung si zo hi Zeisu min phat hi Sihna zo a hing kik ta hi

title: A Sawt Lo In Ah Inn Ah Ciah Ding
text:
ZBC 446, Galhiam 155

  • Lampi ah hong lungnuam sak ding la khat sa ni A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciang ding Zan khua mial being ding in Ni tang tawntungna sungah A sawt lo in ah inn ah ciah ding

A sawt lo-in ah a sawt lo-in ah Tuipi hual in kantan ding Eite kimu ding, huihpi nung a ven ciangin A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

  • Sep ding in muh peuh Ih khutin ih sem ding hi A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding Pasian hehpihna in Ih tha hong khauh sak ding A sawt lo-in inn ah ciah ding

A sawt lo-in ah a sawt lo-in ah Tuipi hual in kantan ding Eite kimu ding, huihpi nung a ven ciangin A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

  • A gim khete ading lam Ih maai sak ding hi A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding Itna lungsim ki zel kim in Hoihna lawh hen a sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

A sawt lo-in ah a sawt lo-in ah Tuipi hual in kantan ding Eite kimu ding, huihpi nung a ven ciangin A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

  • Lungkhamna pengin Tawhdamna gal khatah om A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding Tua khuapi nuam sungah Khitui luanna om lo A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

A sawt lo-in ah a sawt lo-in ah Tuipi hual in kantan ding Eite kimu ding, huihpi nung a ven ciangin A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

title: Aksi Taang A Om Diam
text:
ZBC 218, Galhiam 256

  • Tu ni-in ah tua gam nuam Ke'n ka ngaih sun hi Nitum iangin ah ka tung ding hi Hehpihna tawh Honpa kiang Ka din ciangin ah Ka lutung aksi taang a om diam?

Ka lutung aksi taang Aksi taang a om diam? Nitak a ni atum ciangin ah Tawldamna inn sungah Ka khanlawh ciangin ah Ka lutung aksi taang a om diam?

  • Topa hatna sungah Naseem in thungen ding Ka ngah mi bang kei hong hi sak in Minthan ni'n aksi taang Kei aading hi kha ding Amah phatna tuihual bang om ciang

Ka lutung aksi taang Aksi taang a om diam? Nitak a ni atum ciangin ah Tawldamna inn sungah Ka khanlawh ciangin ah Ka lutung aksi taang a om diam?

  • Ama mai ka et ciang Bang zah in lungdamna ding A khe phungah suang manpha koih ding Kham khuapi sungah Lungdamna hong khangsak ding Ka lutung aksi taang a om diam?

Ka lutung aksi taang Aksi taang a om diam? Nitak a ni atum ciangin ah Tawldamna inn sungah Ka khanlawh ciangin ah Ka lutung aksi taang a om diam?

title: A Ut Khempeuhte
text:
ZBC 238, Galhiam 323

  • "A zate khempeuh" in hih thu taangko un Leitung khempeuhah hih thupha tung sak un Mi na muh khempeuh hih nuam huai thu ko un "A ut khempeuh hong pai thei"

"A ut khempeuhte, a ut khempeuhte" Cihna thu a mual a guam va thawn sak un Hong it i Pa in hong sam kik lam khialte "A ut khempeuh hong pai thei"

  • Hong paite in zekai nading thu om lo Lut theih lai in lut un, kong honsa'n om zo Zeisu lo thumaan hinna lampi om lo "A ut khempeuh hong pai thei"

"A ut khempeuhte, a ut khempeuhte" Cihna thu a mual a guam va thawn sak un Hong it i Pa in hong sam kik lam khialte "A ut khempeuh hong pai thei"

  • "A ut khempeuhte" thuciam a maantak hi "A ut khempeuhte" thuciam a kip ding hi "A ut khempeuhte" nuntak tawntungna hi "A ut khempeuh hong pai thei"

"A ut khempeuhte, a ut khempeuhte" Cihna thu a mual a guam va thawn sak un Hong it i Pa in hong sam kik lam khialte "A ut khempeuh hong pai thei

title: A Thu Zaza Nuam Ing
text:
Galhiam 169

  • Zeisu thu thei semsem nuam ing Hong itna thu gengen nuam ing Kei tang a si Pa hong itna A cing zaw in ka thei nuam ta

A thu zaza nuam ing A thu zaza nuam ing Kei tang a si Pa hong itna A cing zaw in ka thei nuam ta

  • Zeisu thu ke'n sinsin nuam ing A deihna khentel thei nuam ing Pasian Khasiangtho ka Siapa'n Khris zia leh tong hong lakkhia ta'n

A thu zaza nuam ing A thu zaza nuam ing Kei tang a si Pa hong itna A cing zaw in ka thei nuam ta

  • Zeisu kammal zaza nuam in Topa tawh ho limlim nuam ing A aw ngai ning vai khempeuh ah A gen teng ka pom kim nuam ta

A thu zaza nuam ing A thu zaza nuam ing Kei tang a si Pa hong itna A cing zaw in ka thei nuam ta

  • Van tokhom ah a tutna thu Van hauhna teng a neih na thu A gam zai nang leh hong pai nang Za nuam ing Kumpa a sauh nang

A thu zaza nuam ing A thu zaza nuam ing Kei tang a si Pa hong itna A cing zaw in ka thei nuam ta

title: A Thupi
text:
Galhiam 282

  • Vanglian thuneih na Kumpi hihna Pianpih na te le mihing bawl tawm nate Pilna leh theihna te sang athupi pen in Lei pian ma'n Nang na om khin zo hi
  • Kumpi gam luahna Kumpi tokhom Leitung in a thuak ngei lamdang sakna te Hauhna nopsak nate sang a thupi pen in Na mah zah ding ki seh zolo hi

Hong kithat suang lak hong ki vui Siding nong pai Nang bek hong ki pam paih Lingpaak bang hong kituahcil hi Kei nong it ma Lei lak kia sa nong tawm hi

title: A Tawntung
text:
Galhiam 283, Key G

  • Ka nuntak na nong kem den hi Phalbi, khua khal , tuk hun sung Na khut tawh nong huai hi Thuman na ah kei nong kha hi Nang kong lam en hi Nang kong ngak den hi

Nong itna la in kasa ding hi Kei tungah nong muan huai hi Na ang sungah kei nong pom den hi Nong khah ngei keing ding hi A tawn tung

Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah

title: A Sawt Lo In Innah Ciah Ding
text:
ZBC 446, Galhiam 155

  • Lampi ah hong lungnuam sak ding la khat sa ni A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciang ding Zan khua mial being ding in Ni tang tawntungna sungah A sawt lo in ah inn ah ciah ding

A sawt lo-in ah a sawt lo-in ah Tuipi hual in kantan ding Eite kimu ding, huihpi nung a ven ciangin A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

  • Sep ding in muh peuh Ih khutin ih sem ding hi A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding Pasian hehpihna in Ih tha hong khauh sak ding A sawt lo-in inn ah ciah ding

A sawt lo-in ah a sawt lo-in ah Tuipi hual in kantan ding Eite kimu ding, huihpi nung a ven ciangin A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

  • A gim khe te ading lam Ih maai sak ding hi A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding Itna lungsim ki zel kim in Hoihna lawh hen a sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

A sawt lo-in ah a sawt lo-in ah Tuipi hual in kantan ding Eite kimu ding, huihpi nung a ven ciangin A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

  • Lungkhamna pengin Tawhdamna gal khatah om A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding Tua khuapi nuam sungah Khitui luanna om lo A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

A sawt lo-in ah a sawt lo-in ah Tuipi hual in kantan ding Eite kimu ding, huihpi nung a ven ciangin A sawt lo-in ah inn ah ciah ding

title: A Sangna Lam Ka Kahto Hi
text:
Galhiam 327, ZBC 268

  • A sangna lam ka kahto hi Nisim a thak ka tung zo hi Kahto kawm kong thum lai Topa "Hong suanto in a sangzaw ah"

Topa aw hong domto in la Ka muh ngei nai loh van zaangah Upna tawh hong dingto sak in A sangzaw ah hong suan to in

  • Lungmanna launa tamna ah Midangte a ut hang in ah Kei ka lungsim a ut kei hi Kei' tupna a sang zaw na hi

Topa aw hong domto in la Ka muh ngei nai loh van zaangah Upna tawh hong dingto sak in A sangzaw ah hong suan to in

  • A sangzaw a misiangte' la Upna tawh kei mah in ka za Dawi mangpa'n thal in hong kap hang Ka sangzaw nuam hi leitung sang

Topa aw hong domto in la Ka muh ngei nai loh van zaangah Upna tawh hong dingto sak in A sangzaw ah hong suan to in

  • A sangpen dong ka kah nuam hi Vangliatna taang ka mu nuam hi Vantung ka muh dong Topa aw A sangzaw ah hong pito aw

Topa aw hong domto in la Ka muh ngei nai loh van zaangah Upna tawh hong dingto sak in A sangzaw ah hong suan to in
